title: God of light and matchless splendor

verses.text:
God of light and matchless splendor,
Feeble though the praise we bring,
Let thy Spirit touch, and tender
Every heart as now we sing.

Grateful praise my tongue shall offer,
'Neath thy smile or 'neath thy rod;
Take the humble gift I proffer,â€”
Heart and soul and mind, O God!

Living only to thy glory,
From all selfish motives free,
So shall I proclaim the story
Of the One who died for me.
